imdb.plot outline: For Catherine Ester, no subject is taboo and everyone she comes across is a potential victim for her Machiavellic ways. Inately crafty, our heroine takes advantage of everyday situations to attain the evil pleasure she craves. Through black humor and the ferocious exploits of its main character, Twisted reveals the reality of the obscure goings-on in today's society.
imdb.title: Plaisir de nuire, joie de décevoir
akas: Plaisir de nuire, joie de décevoir (France)
plot: For Catherine Ester, no subject is taboo and everyone she comes across is a potential victim for her Machiavellic ways. Inately crafty, our heroine takes advantage of everyday situations to attain the evil pleasure she craves. Through black humor and the ferocious exploits of its main character, Twisted reveals the reality of the obscure goings-on in today's society.::Brigitte Coquelle
